controller

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Handler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EndTurnHandler, GameHandler, MoveHandler, PickUpHandler, ThrowIdentityDiskHandler, TurnHandler, UseItemHandler

    public abstract class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class (abstract) that will be implemented by all our use case handlers.
